About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a hardworking, loyal, self-motivated Developer who brings knowledge from around the world. It is impossible to judge personality, workmanship, and competence by this website. How do I make myself stand out from other applicants? My experience traveling to 10 other countries is a start; along with a summer internship spent building apps for the Ho-Chunk Nation, which broadened my knowledge of programming and the importance of teamwork. Also, my time with Dodl.es and TESCHGlobal has helped me get my foot in the door and start my development career.

TESCHGlobal

Grafton, WI 09/2017 - Current
Solutions Engineer

Extended functionality to and maintained various mobile and web applications for numerous clients.
Learned and adapted to the different programming languages used to contribute to each project.
Wrote documentation for a RCP plugin that extended Talend Open Studio.

dodl.es

Combined Locks, WI 05/2017 - 09/2017
QA Intern and Mobile Developer

Created a guideline for and preformed regression testing to verify software quality and integrity before it was released.
Wrote test scripts in Java for automated testing within Appium.
Implemented design components in React Native.

Ho-Chunk Nation

Black River Falls, WI 06/2014 - 08/2014
I.T. Intern

Designed .NET-based multi-threaded admin web applications.
Analyzed and designed relational databases using SQL Servers.
Engineered in Java the configuration of the Ho-Chunk Gaming mobile application
